# MLComputeDevice.neuralEngine(_:)

**Case**

A device that represents a Neural Engine compute device.

## Declaration

```swift
case neuralEngine(MLNeuralEngineComputeDevice)
```

## Device types

- **MLComputeDevice.cpu(_:)**: A device that represents a CPU compute device.
- **MLComputeDevice.gpu(_:)**: A device that represents a GPU compute device.
